data.actual_result: Background highlight jumps back to the top role
data.expected_result: Background highlight stays on the role you're hovering over
data.short_description: When hovering over a role to add permissions to for a channel/category, Discord will reselect the top role
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into category/channel settings and go to permissions - Click the add role button - Move your mouse down the list and rest it on the third or fourth role - Watch the background highlight
